game.name: Obscurite Magie: The Blood of Kings
game.shortDescription: Adventurer Lietta Fane's mentor and guardian Negel was murdered. She swears vengeance against his murderer and sets off to confront her destiny.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Adventurer Lietta Fane's mentor and guardian Negel was murdered. She swears vengeance against his murderer and sets off to confront her destiny.

reviewHighlights.text: My review is intended only for adults who use the adult patch. The game is mediocre. I gave a recommendation since: + It has everything you wish an Er...
